xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: app:test
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: app:test($node as node(), $params as element()?, $model as item()*) as item()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: This is a sample templating function. It will be called by the templating module if it encounters an HTML element with a class attribute: class="app:test". The function has to take exactly 3 parameters.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $node the HTML node with the class attribute which triggered this call
$params? an XML fragment containing any parameters passed with the class
$model* an arbitrary sequence - used to pass information between template calls
